patthana9.2:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.2:4.2: Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.2:6.1: Nahetuṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.2:8.1: Nahetuṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
